How do you spend your free time?
Most weekends, my husband and I work around the house or do shopping,...
Sometimes we play at the tennis courts by our house.
Did you catch the last Wimbledon tournament?
I can't stand watching it on TV.
I love golf, but I don't care much for watching it.
I've heard some of the best golf courses in the country are in this region.
I've played on most of them and lost every time!
